code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"./SystemModal-styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SystemModal=_ref=>{let{onClose,onSystemSelect}=_ref;const[systems,setSystems]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("/api/configs").then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setSystems(data)).catch(err=>console.error("Error loading systems:",err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"system-modal",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"system-modal__content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"system-modal__title",children:"\u0412\u0438\u0431\u0435\u0440\u0456\u0442\u044C \u0441\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0435\u043C\u0443"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"system-modal__list",children:systems.map(system=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"system-modal__item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:system.system}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"system-modal__sublist",children:system.configs.map(config=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"system-modal__subitem",onClick:()=>onSystemSelect(system.system,config.filename.replace(".json","")),children:[config.name," (",config.version,")"]},config.filename))})]},system.system))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"system-modal__close",onClick:onClose,children:"\u2716"})]})});};export default SystemModal;
